text: Story of the Year is an American alternative rock band. They formed in 2002 in St. Louis. The members of the group are Dan Marsala, the singer, Ryan Phillips, who plays the Guitar, Philip Sneed, who plays the guitar, Adam Russell, who plays the Bass guitar and Josh Wills, who plays the Drums. ==Discography== ===Studio albums=== * Page Avenue (2003) * In the Wake of Determination (2005) * The Black Swan (2008) * The Constant (2010) * Page Avenue: 10 Years and Counting (2013) * Wolves (2017) * Tear Me to Pieces (2023) ===Live albums=== * Live in the Lou/Bassassins (2005) ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:American alternative rock bands Category:American punk bands Category:Post-hardcore bands Category:Post-grunge bands Category:Musical groups from Missouri Category:Musical groups established in 2002 Category:Musical groups disestablished in 2011 Category:2002 establishments in the United States Category:2011 disestablishments in the United States Category:2000s American music groups Category:2010s American music groups
title: Story of the Year
